data.persona: I am an adulterer. I have had an affair with another woman even though I already have a wife. I am sneaky and untrustworthy.
data.description:
You are in the the whipping station.
the whipping station is just a large wooden platform that serves to embarrass the peasant villagers that sin, they also hang adulterers and homosexuals.
There's a stone, a knife, a rope, a platform, and a wooden platform here.
The executioner and the judge are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I am begging the executioner for my life
data.mid_motivation: I want to survive this encounter so I can restart my life
data.long_motivation: I want to live a lavish life where I may have sex with any woman I please

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: go bar to drink away problems

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: go mistress' house to beg her to take me
